name: SHOOT THE BALL
description:
Shoot the ball may seem like a very easy game due to its simplicity, but nothing is further from reality, Shoot the ball is a very difficult game, which will make any player need 100% of their abilities to achieve high scores.

In Shoot the Ball you have to shoot a ball without touching the spinning obstacles. The ball will always start from the center of the figure, and you will have to send it out. The figures that will surround the ball will be in many different ways, always leaving gaps so that the ball can go out of it.

If you shoot the ball 5 times in a row the game gets faster and more challenging.


How to Play?

If you want the ball to shoot out you just have to left click with your mouse. There is a small delay between the pulsation and the shot of the ball, in addition, the figure will continue to move, which will have to take into account all these incentives if you do not want the ball to collide with the figure.ç

If the ball hits the figure you will lose, and you can play again starting from 0 points, get ready to beat your own records!
